channel.title: Server development
channel.description:
[center]~~[b]The Development Team[/b]~~[/center] [center]~1~ kilermage3 ~2~ newb ~3~ mjonh ~4~ darksoul706[/center]
I need a server development team.
Post what u can code here.
I need coders that can stay to code the server and not leave.
So post what u can code here and we can talk on what you would like the server to have.
And I'll post what i want the server to have.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2006, 10:01:59 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Server development
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

lothy:

Hmm, it’s not really good to expect people to work under you in a team, especially when you’re not really a reputable member etc. Besides, most things aren’t hard to make solo at all - The biggest project I did myself was a full working Tutorial Island, a replica of the real RuneScape tutorial island pretty much, minus the walkable interfaces. That took me 4 days at the most to code, and that included omitting bugs and so on… And collecting all of the information. So you can do this kind of thing solo quite easily.[br][size=1]Posted on: 30 December 2006, 18:12:19[/size][hr]Oh, and don’t private message me asking me to join, I don’t really like that. Not from people that come across as 8 year olds at least.

Well I’m not 8 years old. Also I think that my team will join some other team. And I never thought of asking you to join anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Server development
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Hmm, it’s not really good to expect people to work under you in a team, especially when you’re not really a reputable member etc. Besides, most things aren’t hard to make solo at all - The biggest project I did myself was a full working Tutorial Island, a replica of the real RuneScape tutorial island pretty much, minus the walkable interfaces. That took me 4 days at the most to code, and that included omitting bugs and so on… And collecting all of the information. So you can do this kind of thing solo quite easily.[br][size=1]Posted on: 30 December 2006, 18:12:19[/size][hr]Oh, and don’t private message me asking me to join, I don’t really like that. Not from people that come across as 8 year olds at least.

Read full topic

item.title: Server development
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

Sorry I was gone yesterday.

My Internet went down for the entire night.

So yes I’ll add to msn.

So I guess that the development team would just me,newb, and mjonh.

If anyone else that wants to code this source or server you are welcome to join.

So far only 3 ppl. Join now![br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 09:28:24 AM[/size][hr]The source that we will use is pimpscape. Its an all pk source.

But I would like to change this source, into what I want to “Total War Scape”.

I will post the features that I want the source or server to have.

I will give you guys a link so then you can go to were we can talk on what to add to this source or server.

As I said before come on and join the development team now to make a great source or server.

[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 09:34:29 AM[/size][hr]So join now, the more ppl to help build this source or server the better. If you just want a reward on help make this source or server. Then I don’t know what to give as a reward.

And so far the only reward there is to be a admin on the source or server.

If you got any suggestions on what the reward should then post it here.

The suggestions should not be the following.

[ul][li]No real Money[/li]
[li]No free RS money[/li]
[li]No RS accounts[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
